h2_title: How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector
content: In the first portion of the fight, the Supreme Inspector will perform a combo of melee attacks using the sword, often followed by a grab from its feet. Alternatively, he will fly close to the ground and quickly charge toward you. You'll also see The Supreme Inspector rise up from the ground, twirl around, and send out shockwaves in multiple directions. You can move from side to side to avoid these or dodge out of the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Supreme_Celestial_Inspector.md', within the main section titled 'Supreme Celestial Inspector', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Supreme Celestial Inspector' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
In the first portion of the fight, the Supreme Inspector will perform a combo of melee attacks using the sword, often followed by a grab from its feet. Alternatively, he will fly close to the ground and quickly charge toward you. You'll also see The Supreme Inspector rise up from the ground, twirl around, and send out shockwaves in multiple directions. You can move from side to side to avoid these or dodge out of the way.
